content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Course explores why dealing with risks needs to be part of the everyday process used to manage a project, helps to learn to outline the most common, pragmatic approaches to identifying risks specific to a project, recalls methods for qualifying and quantifying your risks to determine specific risks and manage their costs. Examines the primary considerations for a project risk plan and what components should be included in every plan, assess techniques that help you identify the overall risk a project presents to your business and examines several risk analysis and filtering examples that help ensure you've addressed individual risks properly on your project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To-Do:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Study \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=ec115651-af8e-4210-a62a-f5bbc92b550b&source=LYNDA_COURSE\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project Management Foundations: Risk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" course as e-learner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
